name: Five Nights at Cowdy's
description:
This is a fan game for Five Nights at Freddy's. It's a simple point and click game where you have to survive in an office as a security guard at a pizza restaurant with animatronics. The animatronics  will come after you so you have to save battery close doors and for no reason look at the cameras. 

NOTICE! THIS GAME CONTAINS MANY BUGS!
